content.text:
<image 1> 'The title of the painting refers to

A. the chaperones on the right, who are in half-shadow in the background
B. the attendants to the princess in the foreground
C. the king and queen, seen in the reflected mirror
D. the dwarf and the midget in the right foreground

The title of the painting "Las Meninas" (The Maids of Honor) by Diego Velázquez refers to:

B. the attendants to the princess in the foreground

The painting depicts a group of maids of honor (meninas in Spanish) attending to the young Infanta Margaret Theresa, the daughter of King Philip IV of Spain. The title directly references these attendants who are prominently featured in the foreground of the painting.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
